Rulings.Base: 1. If a Warrior-Type monster is targeted by "Shrink" while its ATK is being increased with the effect of "Comrade Swordsman of Landstar", first the original ATK of the Warrior-Type monster is halved, then the 400 ATK gain is reapplied.\n2. If "The Wicked Dreadroot" is face-up on the field and you control "Comrade Swordsman of Landstar", first all Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK, then the ATK of each Warrior-Type monster is halved.\n3. The effects of multiple "Comrade Swordsman of Landstar" are cumulative.
